notes.player: A character armed with an Empyrean Brain Mine can attempt to plant it, waiting for an enemy to enter a Zone where it automatically triggers. The Brain Mine attempts to latch onto the triggering creature, who can make a Difficult (−10) Reflex (Dodge) Test to avoid it. On a fail, the Mine latches onto the target, and they are Stunned for 1d5 Rounds. Alternatively, a character can attempt to Grapple a foe and attach the Brain Mine to them. Once Restrained through the Grapple, the target must make a Difficult (−10) Reflex (Dodge) Test to avoid it. On a fail, the Mine latches onto the target, and they are Stunned for 1d5 rounds.
